response.value:
the most popular means of transportation is bike, Cycling has many advantages, for example, it can make our body healthier and protect our environment. Cycling can also make you spend less money to travel, but it also has many disadvantages. Cycling is very unsafe. You need to pay attention to the traffic at all times. When you ride home, you need to change your clothes, so I think we can ride in a safe place。

second most popular transport is train。The train is very fast, and it is also very convenient near the station. It can reach the destination quickly, with a good external environment, but it will be very crowded to take the train in the morning or after work. You also need to arrive at the station in advance, which is not very convenient。

It's convenient to take a train or a bike, so we can choose by ourselves

data.stimulus:
You are going to write a report for your University.

You should…

  • Write about the TWO most popular means of transportation used by students
  • Discuss the advantages AND disadvantages
  • Make some recommendations to the university
 

Analyse the information in the table below:

 

Write your report using  ALL the information in the table.

Write COMPLETE sentences. Do NOT use bullet points.

Use at least ONE of your own ideas in the recommendations section.

 

Follow the report structure you can see below:

 

 

Write your report in the box below. Start with: 

The aim of this report is to ...
